XENO_WYRM: Mana courses throughout this glassy egg.

BLUSANG_LINDWURM: This egg smells faintly like brine.

AEON_WYVERM: It’s almost like time is distorted around this egg.

LUNAR_HERALD: This metallic egg shows faint iridescence in moonlight.

ZYUMORPH: This shiny egg seems to radiate power.

COPPER: This egg gleams with a reddish shine.

SILVER_DRAGON: This egg gives off a beautiful glow.

GOLD_DRAGON: This egg is very reflective}, almost metallic-looking.

CHICKEN: This egg is much smaller than the others.

PAPER_DRAGON: This egg is tiny and made out of several pieces of paper folded together.

CHEESE_DRAGON: This egg is soft and smells uncannily like cheese.

TREE: Oh my. There is a Leetle Tree among the eggs.

MAGMA_DRAGON: This egg is almost too hot to touch.

ICE_DRAGON: This egg has icicles forming on it.

THUNDER_DRAGON: Whenever you go near this egg}, your hair stands on end.

RED_DINO: This egg looks like it doesn’t belong; it is brightly colored with white spots. It’s much warmer than the rest of the eggs.

GREEN_DINO: This egg looks like it doesn’t belong; it is brightly colored with white spots.

BLUE_DINO: This egg looks like it doesn’t belong; it is brightly colored with white spots. It’s much lighter than the other eggs.

YELLOW_DINO: This egg looks like it doesn’t belong; it is brightly colored with white spots. It’s much heavier than the other eggs.
